abstract: Owners of plug-in vehicles met at Crissy Field in San Francisco last weekend as part of National Plug In Day.
snippet: Owners of plug-in vehicles met at Crissy Field in San Francisco last weekend as part of National Plug In Day.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO - Electric car owners, advocates and even a few critics gathered Sunday in 26 cities across the country for the first National Plug In Day, sponsored by Plug In America, a nonprofit group that advocates an accelerated shift to plug-in vehicles.

headline.main: In San Francisco, a Gathering of the E.V. Converted
